section.name: Introduction
section.p: This is a collection of common tools and utilities used throughout the NeuClear framework. They concern them selves with all the little generalistic bits and pieces that dont quite fit neatly elsewhere.

section.name: [12 December, 2003] New release 0.5

Main goal of this release is to support the latest 0.8 release of NeuClear ID. Download it today and join in the NeuClear revolution.

section.name: [11 November, 2003] Released 0.4
section.p: This release is very quick after 0.3, but we deemed it necessary to move a bunch of crypto code from NeuClear ID and NeuClear XMLSig to here. If you are using any of the CVS modules as well as the latest release 0.10 of XMLSig please update to this release.

section.name: [10 November, 2003] Released 0.3
section.p: The first file release of NeuClear Commons has been released. Click the download link to download.
